name: ESP_AT_Lib
keywords: wifi, WebServer, AT-command, wifi-shield, ESP8266, ESP32, Teensy, AVR, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, STM32, nRF52, ESP8266-AT, ESP32-AT, rpi-pico, rp2040, raspberry-pi-pico, pico, mbed
